Package TradingPlatform

Class TradeManager

java.lang.Object
TradingPlatform.TradeManager
public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
TradeManager executes and manages the listed trades

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void executeTrade()
    Determines what SELL orders to BUY from if the trade is valid, and calls updateDatabase.

    gets the current BUY orders for an asset.

    gets the current SELL orders for an asset.
    void updateDatabase​(int sellOrg, int buyOrg)
    Talks to the server(?) to update organisation's credits and assets as well as updates the BUY/SELL order to complete if necessary.
    java.lang.Boolean validTrade()
    returns true if the trade can be executed

    • updateDatabase

      public void updateDatabase​(int sellOrg, int buyOrg)
      Talks to the server(?) to update organisation's credits and assets as well as updates the BUY/SELL order to complete if necessary.
      Parameters:
      sellOrg - The org selling an asset.
      buyOrg - The org buying an asset.
